message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to us and the potential it holds for you, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $8,500 right now.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your situation, I am willing to consider a price of $9,500 for the product. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $9,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really serious about buying this product and I'm willing to go up to $9,000.  This is my final offer, let's see if we can close this deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. In light of your commitment to the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $9,250 for the product. I believe this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, I'm really close to my budget limit.  Let's split the difference and settle on $9,000.  This would allow us both to walk away happy with the deal.
